mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cus_no AS "cusNo", a.cus_name AS "cusName", a.type_id AS "typeId", a.price AS "price", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
